text: How well are your current workflows optimized and streamlined?
How effectively do you measure and track process performance?
How well are standard operating procedures documented and followed?
How effectively do you identify and eliminate process bottlenecks?
How well do you implement process automation where appropriate?
How current and effective is your technology infrastructure?
How well integrated are your various business systems?
How effectively do you use data analytics for decision making?
How well do your digital tools support operational efficiency?
How robust is your data security and backup systems?
How effectively does your team communicate and collaborate?
How well are team roles and responsibilities defined?
How effectively do you provide training and development opportunities?
How well do you measure and manage team performance?
How effectively do you motivate and engage your team members?
